alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:23PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla and southwestern Jefferson Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crawfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, St. Marks, Newport, Shadeville, Port Leon, Wakulla Beach, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs and Plum Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
